definition: a short peg put into the ground to hold a golf ball off the ground, connect with a tee
details:
noun
- a short peg put into the ground to hold a golf ball off the ground
= synonyms: golf tee
- support holding a football on end and above the ground preparatory to the kickoff
= synonyms: football tee
- the starting place for each hole on a golf course
= example: the starting place for each hole on a golf course
verb
- connect with a tee
= example: connect with a tee
- place on a tee
= example: place on a tee
= synonyms: tee up
